attributes.action: No to 300 New Houses in Kingston Bagpuize with Southmoor
attributes.additional_details:
This petition aims to object to all planning applications amounting to 300 new houses in our village, including the first two applications:

P12/V1721/RM and P12/V1836/O

http://www.whitehorsedc.gov.uk/java/support/Main.jsp?MODULE=ApplicationDetails&REF=P12/V1721/RM

http://www.whitehorsedc.gov.uk/java/support/Main.jsp?MODULE=ApplicationDetails&REF=P12/V1836/O

Objecting to increased traffic through the village, increased risks of accidents, insufficient Pre-School and School places and devalued properties.
